alert.note: Alert for Panola; Rusk; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 5:17PM CDT until April 26 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN PANOLA...CENTRAL RUSK AND NORTHWESTERN SHELBY COUNTIES... At 516 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pinehill, or 8 miles southeast of Henderson, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Henderson, Carthage, Pinehill, Minden, Gary City, Chapman, Dotson, Church Hill, Lawsonville, Fairplay and Brachfield. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
